alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 9:05AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County in North Dakota... .Snow melt and recent rainfall is making its way through the Souris River system and is expected to produce minor flooding in the Westhope area. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Westhope. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1414.0 feet, Water is almost valley-wide. The area flooded is grass covered and no buildings are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1414.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue a gradual rise to 1414.5 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 1414.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1414.7 feet on 05/17/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
